name: Zojirushi Stainless Steel Mug, 16oz, Smoky Blue
short_description: Stainless steel vacuum insulation keeps beverages hot or cold for hours
Durable and sanitary 18/8 stainless steel interior
Slicksteel finish. Made of BPA-free plastic
Wide mouth accommodates full size ice cubes
Compact design takes up minimal space while maximizing capacity
Capacity: 16 Fluid Ounce
product_description: Zojirushi SlickSteel Finish Stainless Steel Mug SM-KHE 36/48 Zojirushi's stainless steel vacuum insulation mug will keep your beverages hot or cold for 6 hours. The compact design takes minimal space and fits in all standard cup holders while maximizing capacity. The flip lid is designed to open with a single hand. The flip lid is tightly fitted for excellent heat retention and features a safety lock to prevent accidental opening. These mugs have a stainless steel interior with SlickSteel finish. Utilizing electro-polishing technology, these products are non-coated on the inside and instead use an electrically charged polishing process to treat and finish the interior. The result is a corrosion resistant surface that repels foreign substances and stains, creating a smooth and ultra-clean stainless steel environment for your drinks. SM-KHE Travel Mug Features Beautiful Sleek design Stainless steel vacuum insulation keeps beverages hot or cold for hours Durable and sanitary 18/8 stainless steel interior with SlickSteel Finish SlickSteel Finish interior resists corrosion and repels stains Flip-Open lid with safetly lock prevents the lid from opening accidentally Tight fitted lid keeps beverages hotter or colder than travel mugs Compact design takes minimal space whilemaximizing capacity How does it keep beverages hot or cold? With Zojirushi's renowned vacuum insulation technology, air between the two thin layers of stainless steel on the outer container is removed, creating a vacuum. Because there is no air, the temperature on the outside does not transfer into the container; keeping your beverage hot or cold for hours. About Zojirushi SlickSteel Finish Zojirushi SlickSteel Finish is an alternative to our fluorine nonstick coated products. With the ever changing trends of today, Zojirushi innovation continues to produce choices for any lifestyle. SlickSteel is a registered trademark of Zojirushi. Designed to drink directly from the mug Stopper disassembles for thorough cleaning Wide mouth accommodates full size ice cubes Zojirushi America Corporation warrants only the thermal insulation of certain vacuum insulated products against defects for a period of five years from the date of original retail purchase

name: Mr. Coffee Silverleaf 23 oz Stainless Steel Thermal Bottle – Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Travel Mug with Leak-Proof Lid, Blue – Hot & Cold Beverage Flask for Work, Commute, or Camping
short_description: A BOX INCLUDES: One 23oz stainless steel thermal bottle with lid.

HYDRATION IN ONE CLICK: This insulated bottle features an airtight lid with a smooth, easy-push button for smooth pouring. Just push to click and open, pour your favorite drink, and push again to seal it shut—perfect for travel, commutes and thirst-worthy adventures. Leak-resistant and ready to go anytime.

ALL-DAY REFRESHMENTS: Perfect for the gym, picnics or camping or everyday work breaks, this stainless steel tumbler features double-wall vacuum insulation to keep beverages hot or cold for longer. The non-reactive stainless steel interior preserves the fresh flavors of sodas, fruit-infused teas and cold brews without any metallic aftertaste.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Hand wash only. Do not microwave.
product_description: The Silverleaf 23oz Stainless Steel Thermal Bottle brings rich coffee blends—and more—wherever your day takes you. Designed by Mr. Coffee, this sleek thermal bottle features double-wall vacuum insulation to maintain your drink’s temperature, keeping hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold for longer. The non-reactive stainless steel interior preserves fresh flavors of sodas and fruit-infused teas without a metallic aftertaste. Equipped with two lids for a secure, leak-resistant seal, it’s built for daily commutes, weekend adventures, and everything in between. A smooth push-button lid opens and closes with one easy click, making it the perfect companion for life on the go—whether you're navigating city streets or exploring the great outdoors. Hand wash only. Do not microwave. Savor every flavor with Mr. Coffee. Since 1970, Mr. Coffee has been brewing great tasting coffee and other coffeehouse favorites at home. What started as a selection of easy-switch and programmable coffee makers has now expanded to a variety of kitchen coordinates such as tea kettles, thermal hydration tumblers, stoneware mugs, glass cups and pour-over carafes. With the growing popularity of the coffee-to-go lifestyle and the immense craving for the next, big specialty drink, Mr. Coffee continues to help you conquer the morning, the day and beyond - with Simply Great Coffee.
